index.title: Create, share, and discover knowledge with Knowsay.
index.description: Knowsay is a platform for sharing knowledge in the form of questions and answers(Quizzes). Join us on this journey to make learning fun and interactive.

edit.title: Edit Quiz
edit.description: Update your quiz details and questions to improve the experience for your participants.

notFound.title: Data Not Found
notFound.description: The data you're trying to edit doesn't exist or was deleted.

sections.questionsDescription: Update your quiz questions or add new ones. Changes are saved automatically.

create.title: Create a New Quiz
create.description: Design your interactive quiz with custom questions and share it with others to test their knowledge.

formFields.quizTitleDescription: Choose a catchy title for your quiz that describes its content.
formFields.categoryDescription: Select a category that best fits your quiz content.
formFields.difficultyDescription: Choose how challenging your quiz will be for participants.
formFields.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide details about what your quiz covers...
formFields.descriptionDescription: Give potential quiz takers an idea of what to expect.
formFields.publicQuizDescription: Make your quiz available for everyone to discover and play.

questionsSection.title: Create your quiz first
questionsSection.description: Please fill out the quiz details in the section above. Once the quiz is created, you'll be able to add and customize questions on the next page.
questionsSection.button: Add questions after creating the quiz

usersMangement.title: Users management
usersMangement.description: Change users permissions to manage access

deleteQuiz.dialogDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{quizTitle}"? This action cannot be undone and all associated questions and data will be permanently removed.

toastSuccess.title: Quiz deleted successfully
toastSuccess.description: Your quiz has been permanently removed

myQuiz.title: My Quizzes
myQuiz.description: Review and manage the quizzes you've created.
myQuiz.empty: You haven't created any quizzes yet. Start building your quiz collection now!

usersMangement.title: Users management
usersMangement.description: Change users permissions to manage access
